title: Spacious 4 bedroom 3 bath in San Mateo
posting_body: 4 BEDROOMS 3 BATHROOMS PLUS OFFICE
$12,000 for monthly price which includes water, garbage, and gardener.
Tenant is responsible for PGE, cable/internet, and housekeeping.
$9500 for a year lease which includes garbage, and water up to $100 a month.
Tenant is responsible for all the utilities, housekeeping, and the gardener.
This elegant home in San Mateo neighborhood offers a beautiful views of the bay from the deck.
This residence represents modern design, featuring hardwood floors, high end carpets and surround sound system.
This house has 4 comfortable bedrooms, 3 sophisticated bathrooms.
Enjoy the convenience of washer and dryer in unit, 2 car garage parking, cable, phone, internet.
Beautiful landscaping is newly remodeled (not shown).
You will not want to leave this peaceful house after a full day of activities, and find yourself relaxing in the Jacuzzi tub in the master suite or have a comfortable shower in the walk in shower.
The kitchen is equipped with stainless stove with oven, professional grade refrigerator and freezer stocked with your favorites.
The  formal dining area  seats 8, and the living room with fireplace where you can find a place to sit and read after dinner and enjoy the view of the garden.
ABOUT THE NEIGHBORHOOD
San Mateo is a California city south of San Francisco in the Silicon Valley tech hub.
On the bay, CuriOdyssey is a kid-focused science museum and zoo.
The Coyote Point Recreation Area offers picnic areas, waterfront paths, boat launches and a playground.
Laurelwood Park has trails leading to Sugarloaf Hill.
To the south, the Greek-style Pulgas Water Temple commemorates the completion of the Hetch Hetchy aqueduct.
Features and Amenities
Decks and garden
View of the Bay and City
Outdoor Jacuzzi
Indoor jacuzzi tub and steam shower
